title: This is a team game....
body:
So logically being a team player and trying to work together as best you can would be good right?

wrong. carry or lose.

i only seem to win if I:

1. get so fed that even on nautilus i carry
2. pick off so many easy kills with max range thresh hooks that my team just jumps on them.
3. All other options lead to failure.

i can't trust my own team mates with gold about 80% of the time.... because usually it comes back and they get a kill streak, then feed hard thinking they are god among men.
